name: Cave In (Anthony Hope Games)
description:
Two miners best friends you could even call them brothers are working at the base of a winding cave mining for gold, it's time for Hickory to do some mining so Sorek is holding the lamp for a change.

Then the ground starts to shake the lights start to flicker and a terrible crashing sound as the roof caves in and both Hickory and Sorek are separated by a wall of rock.
